Access Devices

Access network devices are managed and auto-configured by the PW EMS.

The following device types are included in an access network:

  • Virtual Baseband Unit (vBBU) is a Virtualized All-Generation (G) Radio Access Network (RAN) baseband server deployed at the network edge, incorporating O-RAN distributed unit (DU) and centralized unit (CU) functions.
  • Remote Radio Head (RRH) is a multi-carrier outdoor and weatherproof radio for LTE access services.
  • Converged Wireless System (CWS) is a Multiple Radio Access Technology (Multi-RAT) base station with an integrated backhaul that supports simultaneously LTE, LTE Advanced, 3G, and Wi-FiÂ® access. The CWS series comes in different form factors for outdoor, specialized in-vehicle, and indoor use.
